readable.title: 489134459_1b3f46fc03
readable.content: a boy and a girl stand in front of a house . A girl stands nearby while a boy sits in an open doorway . A girl stands outside of a blue and white home while a younger child sits on its stoop . A little girl leans on a concrete wall next to a blue door where a shirtless child sits . A young girl stands against a blue and white house with a young boy who sits .
